summary: Protocol errors in the PHP SDK's GRPC client are not being retried, only service-level errors are. The issue requests that protocol errors be included in the retry logic for better resilience.
userImpact: Applications may fail to recover from transient protocol errors that could otherwise be retried, reducing reliability.
rootCause: BaseClient retry logic only handles service-level errors, not protocol-level errors from the GRPC layer.
proposedFix: Include protocol errors in the retry logic alongside service-level errors.
resolutionDetails: Fix was included in the next release with improved error handling and more verbose error messages for connection issues.
keyQuote: protocol errors are not being retried (only service level errors) ... please retry protocol errors too.
